subject: Dear Humble Beneficiary, Th
body:
Attention Humble Beneficiary  :

We received your email in good condition and the content well noted.

Kindly be advice to reconfirm your  details stated below for the immediate
verification of your compensation funds of the sum of the sum of
$6,800,000.00 online bank account user name and password in your favor to
avoid the wrong payment to the wrong person.

(1) Your Full Name
(2) Home Address of Office Address
(3) Direct Cell number or Watsapp number
(4) Your Valid Identity Card or Passport
(5) Your Next of Kin
(6) Male or Female

As soon as we received the following details, we will proceed ahead
immediately for the immediate release of your online bank account user name
and password in your favor to enable you start making withdraw from your
online bank account to any bank account of your choice around the globe
without any further delay. It is our reputation to serve you better.

We look forward for your urgent reply.

Your in service

Mrs Mercy Philip
